sentence.Network_en: There was a sachet of shampoo in the bathroom.
When she sighed she exhaled a heavy perfume of sachet powder.
sentence.Network_cn: 她叹息的时候,呼出浓重的香粉的香气.

sentence.Network_en: I caught a faint odour of violet sachet.
sentence.Network_cn: 我闻到一股紫罗兰香粉的淡淡的清香味儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 香包(sachet)，古代称“香囊”，亦称“佩帷”、“容臭”、“香袋儿”、“荷包”，庆阳俗称“绌绌”或“耍活”。它是用彩色丝线在彩绸上绣制出各种 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (in sense 2): from French, little bag', diminutive of sac, from Latin saccus 'sack, bag'

entry.def: A sachet is a small closed plastic or paper bag, containing a small quantity of something.

example.tran: 独立包装的小袋速溶咖啡

means.word_mean: 1. a small soft bag containing perfumed powder; used to perfume items in a drawer or chest
